text: Michael Manning Weatherly, Jr. (born July 8, 1968) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Special Agent Anthony DiNozzo on the television series NCIS. After being in over 300 episodes he is leaving NCIS at the end of the 2016 season. He also plays Dr. Jason Bull in the CBS drama series Bull. == References == == Other websites == *Official Michael Weatherly website * Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Michael Weatherly
